description: This json file contains the corrections for deepJet and deepCSV AK4 c-taggers. Corrections are supplied for c-tagging working point corrections (wp).

corrections.name: deepJet_wp
corrections.description: deepJet fixedWP c-tagging factors for UL 2017. 'up' and 'down' variations are available for the different measurement types. The uncertainties are to be decorrelated between b/c jets ('wcharm') and light jets ('incl')

inputs.name: method
inputs.description: incl for light jets, wcharm for b/c jets

corrections.name: deepCSV_wp
corrections.description: deepCSV fixedWP c-tagging factors for UL 2017. 'up' and 'down' variations are available for the different measurement types. The uncertainties are to be decorrelated between b/c jets ('wcharm') and light jets ('incl')

inputs.name: method
inputs.description: incl for light jets, wcharm for b/c jets
